title: Bug on PBE doesn't seem to be getting attention
body: Whenever I try to start a game as Aurelion Sol, It crashes in the loading screen.

replies.body:
Hey! 

We were aware of this occurring the other day - could you let me know if you're still experiencing this after the next PBE update?
Katey I think it's when the AuSol alt tabs.  I have a pretty good repro rate on it.
It happened to me and my PBE friends when the Sol didn't Alt+Tab
Did the Sol select the skin by any chance?  I know that bugs it out too most of the time.

Try repairing the client by clicking the question mark on the top right of the launcher. The PBE boards may have more information if it's a common issue, and PBE bugs should be posted over there.

http://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/
